hero.title: Experienced <span1>Software Engineer</span1> specialized in <span2>Full-Stack</span2> Development
hero.subtitle: From concept to launch, I craft web platforms that are robust, scalable, and designed to engage, powered by the latest in technology trends.

description.paragraph1: I started my software journey in robotics with a focus on Computer Vision from 2019 to 2021, giving robots the gift of sight.
description.paragraph2: Motivated by the innovative dynamics of web technology, I transitioned to Web Development in 2021.
description.paragraph3: With over 5 years of experience as a Software Engineer, I thrive on challenges and am always eager for opportunities to learn and grow.

description.paragraph1: Work on Souk, a high-performance Vinted scraper ensuring users never miss out on best products.
description.paragraph2: Optimized Golang backend for scalability and speed.
description.paragraph3: Collaborated closely with designers to create a new branding.
description.paragraph4: Development of both apps for mobile (React Native) & desktop (Next.js).

description.paragraph1: Creation of Serendy, an dating app that shifts the focus from endless messaging to real-life connections.
description.paragraph2: Users can see who is nearby and propose a date. If the request is accepted, Serendy chooses a local bar where users will meet in real life.
description.paragraph3: Deployment of the application on both App Store and Play Store.

description.paragraph1: Development of tools for Milleis private bankers, focusing on tasks like client file creation and online signatures
description.paragraph2: Used Angular for the Front-End of various applications, embracing a mono-repo setup facilitated by Nx.

description.paragraph1: Contributed to the development of GEFORA, a strategic tool empowering the French army in troop and operations oversight.
description.paragraph2: Used an Angular Front-End with communicated with a Nest.js Back-End.
description.paragraph3: All was inside a Nx mono-repo, and data management was facilitated with PostgreSQL and TypeORM.

description.paragraph1: Development of the Back Office application, offering operational staff an efficient tool for purchasing and shipping products.
description.paragraph2: Employed Angular for the Front-End to implement design from Figma.

description.paragraph1: Created the architectural blueprint of the NAVCAM, emphasizing a seamless interface between the software and the HMI.
description.paragraph2: Employed ROS 2 with C++ for the robotic framework, integrated NodeJS and Express for the Back-End, and utilized Angular for the HMI.

description.paragraph1: Directed the software development for Set Vision, a featured product on both robots Niryo One & Niryo Ned.
description.paragraph2: Led the creation of vision modules for different robots of both educational and industrial sectors, involving decisions from camera selection to guiding the robot's actions with objects.
description.paragraph3: Employed Python, ROS, and OpenCV for the robotic systems & Angular for the HMI.

description.paragraph1: Built to the Video Summary segment of MediaCentric®, a solution that acquires video files from diverse sources like YouTube, Facebook, and Twitter.
description.paragraph2: My primary objective was to provide a rapid and comprehensive synthesis of web videos extracted by the solution.
description.paragraph3: To achieve this, I used deep learning techniques and OpenCV to detect keyframes, and extract faces & texts.

description.paragraph1: Immersed myself in a 10-week internship dedicated to the Owl Robot, a robotics project at the University of Plymouth.
description.paragraph2: My primary task was to refine the target tracking algorithm with OpenCV.

description.paragraph1: Profile Perfect AI allows users to create AI-generated photos. All users have to do is upload a few photos of themselves, and the AI will generate a new photo of them.
description.paragraph2: Whether on LinkedIn, dating apps, or social networks, you can be sure that your profile photo leaves a lasting impression.
description.paragraph3: The AI also provides personalized recommendations on how to improve your profile.

description.paragraph1: TGV Max Extra is a web application enabling TGV Max subscribers to create alerts and be notified when €0 tickets are available.
description.paragraph2: The data comes from a scrapper that uses proxies to retrieve SNCF data.
description.paragraph3: The application had 500+ users and 1000+ alerts send in less than 3 months.

sudokuSolver.subtitle: Solve any Sudoku with Computer Vision

description.paragraph1: Resolves multiple Sudoku grids in real-time & projects the solution with Augmented Reality.
description.paragraph2: This project has garnered more than 600 stars on GitHub.

littleCarAI.subtitle: Use AI to teach a car to drive

description.paragraph1: Creation of a simulation environment where a car learns to drive using through Reinforcement Learning
description.paragraph2: This project intricately processes inputs from LIDAR and vehicle speed, with a neural network at its core that evolves through iterative improvements, ensuring each generation surpasses the last.

description.paragraph1: The Master covered a broad spectrum, from general electronics to machine learning, focusing particularly on image processing.
description.paragraph2: Key projects featured deep learning for noise reduction in speech & creating an Arduino device for air quality assessment with online data integration.

description.paragraph1: Immersed myself in the Physics & Chemistry preparatory track (PCSI/PC*), setting the stage for competitive engineering school exams.
description.paragraph2: It gave me a lot of theoretical knowledge about science, and it also taught me rigor and how to manage a heavy workload.
